languages.text: "Вы нас не бросили! Слава Богу-Императору, если бы не ваша находчивость..."
"You did not abandon us! Thank the God-Emperor, if it hadn't been for your quick thinking..."
languages.original_text: "Вы нас не бросили! Слава Богу-Императору, если бы не ваша находчивость..."

traits.locale_text: "You did not abandon us! Thank the God-Emperor, if it hadn't been for your quick thinking..."
"You did not abandon us! Thank the God-Emperor, if it hadn't been for your quick thinking..."
"You did not abandon us! Thank the God-Emperor, if it hadn't been for your quick thinking..."
"You did not abandon us! Thank the God-Emperor, if it hadn't been for your quick thinking..."

languages.text: "Ihr habt uns nicht im Stich gelassen! Dem Gottimperator sei gedankt, denn ohne Euren raschen Verstand ..."
languages.original_text: "You did not abandon us! Thank the God-Emperor, if it hadn't been for your quick thinking..."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt uns nicht im Stich gelassen! Dem Gottimperator sei gedankt, denn ohne Euren raschen Verstand ..."

languages.text: “你没有抛弃我们！感谢神皇，要不是你反应这么快的话……”
languages.original_text: "You did not abandon us! Thank the God-Emperor, if it hadn't been for your quick thinking..."

traits.locale_text: “你没有抛弃我们！感谢神皇，要不是你反应这么快的话……”

languages.text: « Vous ne nous avez pas abandonnés ! L'Empereur-Dieu soit loué ! Si vous n'aviez pas été là... »
languages.original_text: "You did not abandon us! Thank the God-Emperor, if it hadn't been for your quick thinking..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne nous avez pas abandonnés ! L'Empereur-Dieu soit loué ! Si vous n'aviez pas été là... »

languages.text: «¡No nos ha abandonado! Loado sea el Dios Emperador, de no ser por la rapidez con que ha actuado...».
languages.original_text: "You did not abandon us! Thank the God-Emperor, if it hadn't been for your quick thinking..."

traits.locale_text: «¡No nos ha abandonado! Loado sea el Dios Emperador, de no ser por la rapidez con que ha actuado...».

languages.text: 「あなたは我々を見捨てなかった！神帝陛下に感謝を。もしあなたの機転がなければ…」
languages.original_text: "You did not abandon us! Thank the God-Emperor, if it hadn't been for your quick thinking..."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは我々を見捨てなかった！神帝陛下に感謝を。もしあなたの機転がなければ…」
「あなたは我々を見捨てなかった！神帝陛下に感謝を。もしあなたの機転がなければ…」

languages.text: "Bizi terk etmediniz! Tanrı İmparator'a şükürler olsun! Pratik zekânız olmasaydı..."
languages.original_text: "You did not abandon us! Thank the God-Emperor, if it hadn't been for your quick thinking..."

traits.locale_text: "Bizi terk etmediniz! Tanrı İmparator'a şükürler olsun! Pratik zekânız olmasaydı..."
